decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  Notwithstanding the plans hereby approved the first and second floor west facing windows within the new link between building D2 and 42-50 York Way shall be fixed shut and fitted with obscured glazing to prevent the overlooking of neighbouring habitable room windows within the neighbouring property to the west.  

REASON:  In the interest of protecting neighbouring residential amenity in accordance with policy D3 of the Islington UDP 2002.
